cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2

Interface OAuth2Grant

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthorizationCodeGrant, ClientCredGrant, ImplicitGrant, RefreshTokenGrant, ResOwnerPassCredGrant

    public interface OAuth2Grant
extends java.io.Closeable
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/OAuth2Grant.java

    Basic interface for implementing OAuth 2.0 grant.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaromír Staněk

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthorizationRequest authorize()
      Start of the authorization process.
      OAuth2Error getError()
      Returns the last error that has occurred during the authorization process.
      OAuth2Token getToken()
      Returns the access (and refresh) token after successful authorization.
      void setup(OAuth2Settings settings)
      Setting up the grant.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • authorize

        AuthorizationRequest authorize()
        Start of the authorization process. If the implemented grant requires a redirect to authorization server, it is returned as a AuthorizationRequest. If no redirect is required, null should be returned.
        Returns:
        Request for redirect to external web page.

      • getError

        OAuth2Error getError()
        Returns the last error that has occurred during the authorization process.
        Returns:
        Last error occurred.

      • getToken

        OAuth2Token getToken()
        Returns the access (and refresh) token after successful authorization.
        Returns:
        Access token (and optional refresh token).

      • setup

        void setup(OAuth2Settings settings)
           throws OAuth2SettingsException
        Setting up the grant.
        Parameters:
        settings - Settings.
        Throws:
        OAuth2SettingsException - Exception when not proper settings are passed.
